text: Romeo and Juliet is a 1936 American movie starring Leslie Howard, John Barrymore, Edna Mae Oliver, Basil Rathbone, and Norma Shearer. It was directed by George Cukor. It is based on a play by William Shakespeare. It was nominated for four Academy Awards in 1937. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1936 drama movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies based on Romeo and Juliet Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies set in Italy
title: Romeo and Juliet (1936 movie)
